nodes.bodyText: If going to ZK here is too slow, another option is to provide a callback to adminManager.createTopics which can be called after createTopicWithAssignment. I wasn't sure which option was better.

Here could we use controllerContext since createTopicRep is handled at the active controller.

I think we could either do that or just return Uuid.ZERO_UUID
Returning Uuid.ZERO_UUID should be fine. The comment just seems odd, I am not sure why we have it that way in the other methods.
